featured.text: They had apparently pulled out the back seat, crawled behind it, and then had not been able to push the seat forward again.
We are looking forward to seeing you.
They keep moving forward even after a big success. 48.

other.text: The brothers look forward to a family trip on a cruise.
If you are traveling, reserve seats where motion is felt the least, such as the front row of a car or forward cars of a train.
According to the passage, the use of movable type was considered as a "great step forward" because (A) it did not need a lot of wood.
I look forward to seeing her again.
A great step forward was the use of movable type.

definition.zh_def: 向前，前進；促進或傳遞某事物。
definition.en_def: To move or direct something toward a place or position that is ahead.
definition.example: Please forward the email to the team.
